summary: REQ-1’s Instagram URL update appears implemented in ContactSection’s socialLinks and the rendered anchor includes target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". However, the diff summary does not provide enough information to verify that the Facebook and YouTube URLs were not changed. Additional unrelated files were modified (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt), which were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other socialLinks (Facebook, YouTube) URLs are changed.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows current Facebook/YouTube href values, but does not show the previous values (nor an explicit statement that they were unchanged), so this acceptance criterion cannot be verified from the provided diff summary alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata/new feature request entries in project_state.json (AR-1, AR-2) unrelated to implementing the requested Instagram URL change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to update the Instagram URL in ContactSection; it does not request changes to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive content in frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions header/footer tokens, layout/styling changes, Formspree behavior, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to updating the Instagram URL and explicitly disallows styling/layout/icon/label changes; modifying summary documentation is not requested and includes claims beyond the scope.
